titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 1451) to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1988, 1989, 1990, and 1991, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-99.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 5/19/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1451 (old age assistance).
